page.title: 13School Life in Chorley
page.content: "Our school St. Laurence's is a Church of England Aided School. All the pupils there are in the age range of five to eleven. The subjects that are taught consist of English, Maths, Art, Music, Science and Physical Education. Our school day starts at five minutes to nine and finishes at half past three. There are two playtimes each day ;the first one at 10.35a.m. and the second at 2.30p.m. Lunch time starts at 12.00 noon. There is no school uniform.There are seven classes with a mixture of male and female teachers. Infants start at the school either in September or January depending on their birthday. In the juniors there are four house teams; Charnock,Brooke, Standish and Parker (famous Chorley familys).
